TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExpressionContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种在序列化程序之间传递上下文状态的方法。

span.span: Provides a means of passing context state among serializers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 放置在上下文堆栈上并包含在序列化期间最相关的表达式。An is placed on the context stack and contains the most relevant expression during serialization. 下面的 C# 代码演示分配。The following C# code demonstrates an assignment. ```csharp button1.Text = "Hello"; ``` 序列化期间，多个序列化程序负责创建这一条语句。During serialization, several serializers are responsible for creating this single statement. 这些序列化程序之一是负责创建"Hello"。One of those serializers is responsible for creating "Hello". 有些的时候该序列化程序可能需要知道它在其中创建它的表达式的上下文。There are times when that serializer may need to know the context in which it is creating its expression. 在上一示例中，不需要此上下文中。In the previous example, this context is not needed. 下面的 C# 代码演示在其上下文的知识是必要的情况。The following C# code shows a situation in which knowledge of the context is necessary. ```csharp button1.Text = rm.GetString("button1_Text"); ``` 在这种情况下，负责创建的资源表达式的序列化程序需要通知的目标对象的名称。In this case, the serializer responsible for creating the resource expression needs to be informed of the names of the target objects. 类可用于此。The class can be used for this. 因为每个序列化程序创建一个表达式，并调用序列化程序来处理将语句作为一个整体的较小部分，序列化程序上下文堆栈上推送表达式上下文。As each serializer creates an expression and invokes a serializer to handle a smaller part of the statement as a whole, the serializer pushes an expression context on the context stack. 每个表达式的上下文具有在堆栈查找下一步表达式上下文的 parent 属性。Each expression context has a parent property that locates the next expression context on the stack. 这提供了方便的遍历功能。This provides a convenient traversal capability.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用来确定将分配给该表达式时，是否需要强制转换。You can use to determine if a cast is needed when assigning to the expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果表达式是对的属性引用的实例的属性称为`button1`，返回`button1`。If the expression is a property reference to the property of an instance of called `button1`, returns `button1`.
